verses.text: Now \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Zorobabel \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Salathiel, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Josue: Saraia, Jeremias, Esdras,
Amaria, Melluch, Hattus,
Sebenias, Rheum, Merimuth,
Addo, Genthon, Abia,
Miamin, Madia, Belga,
Semeia, \w and|strong="H8098"\w* \w Joiarib|strong="H3114"\w*, Idaia, Sellum, Amoc, Helcias,

Idaia. \w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w were|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Josue.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, Jesua, Bennui, Cedmihel, Sarebia, Juda, Mathanias, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w were|strong="H3881"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hymns:

\w And|strong="H0251"\w* Becbecia, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* Hanni, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w their|strong="H5048"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* every \w one|strong="H0251"\w* \w in|strong="H0251"\w* \w his|strong="H5048"\w* office.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* Josue \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* Joacim, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* Joacim \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* Eliasib, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* Eliasib \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* \w Joiada|strong="H3111"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w Joiada|strong="H3111"\w* \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* Jeddoa.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Joacim \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w families|strong="H0001"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w*: \w Of|strong="H3117"\w* Saraia, Maraia: \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Jeremias, Hanania:
Of Esdras, Mosollam: \w and|strong="H4918"\w* of Amaria, \w Johanan|strong="H3076"\w*:
\w Of|strong="H3130"\w* Milicho, \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*: \w of|strong="H3130"\w* Sebenia, \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*:
Of Haram, Edna: of Maraioth, Helci:
\w Of|strong="H2148"\w* Adaia, Zacharia: \w of|strong="H2148"\w* Genthon, Mosollam:
Of Abia, Zechri: of Miamin \w and|strong="H0029"\w* Moadia, Phelti:
Of Belga, Sammua of Semaia, \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*:
Of \w Joiarib|strong="H3114"\w*, Mathanai: of Jodaia, Azzi:
Of Sellai, Celai: of Amoc, Heber:
Of Helcias, Hasebia: of Idaia, Nathanael.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w chiefs|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w families|strong="H0001"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Eliasib, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w Joiada|strong="H3111"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* Jeddoa, \w were|strong="H3881"\w* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Persian|strong="H6542"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w families|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Chronicles|strong="H1697"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* unto \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jonathan \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliasib.

Now \w the|strong="H5048"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5048"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* Hasebia, Serebia, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Josue \w the|strong="H5048"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Cedmihel: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5048"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w by|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H5048"\w* courses, \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w give|strong="H3034"\w* \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* \w according|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5048"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H5048"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* wait equally \w in|strong="H0430"\w* order.

Mathania, \w and|strong="H8179"\w* Becbecia, Obedia, \w and|strong="H8179"\w* Mosollam, Telmon, Accub, \w were|strong="H7778"\w* \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w and|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* entrances before \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Joacim \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Josue, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Josedec, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nehemias \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w governor|strong="H6346"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Esdras \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w at|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w dedication|strong="H2598"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w out|strong="H1245"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w places|strong="H4725"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w dedication|strong="H2598"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8057"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w singing|strong="H7892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* psalteries \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w singing|strong="H7891"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w plain|strong="H3603"\w* country \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* villages \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nethuphati,

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w from|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Galgal, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w from|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* countries \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w Azmaveth|strong="H5820"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w singing|strong="H7891"\w* men \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* villages \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w purified|strong="H2891"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w purified|strong="H2891"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* Juda \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w choirs|strong="H8426"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w give|strong="H5927"\w* \w praise|strong="H8426"\w*. \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* dunghill \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w them|strong="H0310"\w* went Osaias, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* Juda,
\w And|strong="H4918"\w* Azarias, Esdras, \w and|strong="H4918"\w* Mosollam, Judas, \w and|strong="H4918"\w* Benjamin, \w and|strong="H4918"\w* Semeia, \w and|strong="H4918"\w* Jeremias.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w of|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* priests with trumpets, Zacharias \w the|strong="H3414"\w* son \w of|strong="H3414"\w* Jonathan. \w the|strong="H3414"\w* son \w of|strong="H3414"\w* Semeia, \w the|strong="H3414"\w* son \w of|strong="H3414"\w* Mathania; \w the|strong="H3414"\w* son \w of|strong="H3414"\w* Michaia, \w the|strong="H3414"\w* son \w of|strong="H3414"\w* Zechur, \w the|strong="H3414"\w* son \w of|strong="H3414"\w* Asaph,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3548"\w* brethren Semeia, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Azareel Malalai, Galalai, Maai, Nathanael, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Judas, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Hanani, \w with|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H8098"\w* musical instruments \w of|strong="H1121"\w* David \w the|strong="H8098"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Esdras \w the|strong="H8098"\w* scribe before \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w at|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8098"\w* fountain gate.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w went|strong="H0376"\w* up \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w by|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* stairs \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* city \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* going up \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wall \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* water gate eastward:

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* second choir \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* gave thanks \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w opposite|strong="H5048"\w* \w side|strong="H4217"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* half \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5869"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tower \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* furnaces, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w broad|strong="H5048"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* gate \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Ephraim, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* old gate, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fish gate \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Hananeel, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Emath, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* flock gate: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* stood \w still|strong="H5704"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* watch gate.

\w And|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* two \w choirs|strong="H5975"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* gave praise \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w still|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* house \w of|strong="H8179"\w* God, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* half \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* magistrates \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.
\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* priests, Eliachim, Maasia, Miamin, Michea, Elioenai, Zacharia, Hanania \w with|strong="H5973"\w* trumpets,

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* Maasia, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Semeia, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Eleazar, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Azzi, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Johanan, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Melchia, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Elam, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Ezer. \w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0471"\w* singers sung loud, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Jezraia \w was|strong="H3548"\w* \w their|strong="H3548"\w* overseer:

\w And|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H8085"\w* sacrificed \w on|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* day great sacrifices, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H8085"\w* rejoiced: \w for|strong="H8085"\w* God \w had|strong="H3076"\w* \w made|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w* joyful \w with|strong="H8085"\w* great joy: \w their|strong="H8085"\w* wives \w also|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* children rejoiced, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* joy \w of|strong="H8085"\w* Jerusalem \w was|strong="H0499"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* afar off.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* appointed \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w* over \w the|strong="H3588"\w* storehouses \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* treasure, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* libations, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* firstfruits, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* tithes, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rulers|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H1931"\w* might bring \w them|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w by|strong="H0802"\w* \w them|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* honour \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thanksgiving, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* priests \w and|strong="H0430"\w* Levites: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Juda \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w joyful|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* priests \w and|strong="H0430"\w* Levites \w that|strong="H3588"\w* assisted.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w kept|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* watch \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* observance \w of|strong="H0376"\w* expiation, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* singing \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* porters, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* commandment \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w David|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H5975"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* son.

\w For|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* days \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Asaph \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* beginning there \w were|strong="H1121"\w* chief \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* appointed, \w to|strong="H8104"\w* praise \w with|strong="H0430"\w* canticles, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H8104"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
